text: Ceylon competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. Five competitors, all men, took part in five events in four sports. ==Athletics== * Linus Diaz ==Boxing== * Weerakoon Dharmasiri * Mohandas Liyanage Sumith ==Cycling == One cyclist represented Ceylon in 1960. ;Individual road race * Maurice Coomarawel ==Swimming== * Tony Williams ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1960 Summer Olympics 1960 Category:1960 in Ceylon
title: Ceylon at the 1960 Summer Olympics
